channel.title: Forum SAW I (GAME OVER, SIMON AND JACK WIN)
channel.description:
# Rise and shine. You're probably wondering where you are. I'll tell you where you might be. You might be in the room that you die in.
**Basic Concept** I get 7/8 people to join and I place you in traps in which you must escape with minimal self-mutilation! The traps with either be a. Physical(you have to wiggle out of something) b. Moral (You must save others at the expense of yourself) c. intelligence (searching for a key somewhere) Also, ALL TRAPS ARE ESCAPABLE, you can die easily if you make the wrong choice.
You make a sheet with stats with a maximum of 15 points which you DM to me ex. Physical 4 Morality 7 Intelligence 4
Sin: I stole a candy bar (THIS ISN'T FLAVOR, these will decide your options and success rates!)
# So... do you want to play a game?
**RULES** 1. You must try, that's no fun if people don't value their lives! 2. If you be mean to Jigsaw(Me) you die 3. if you guys wanna make a story out of this you can
PLAYERS 1. @SuperJack 2. @Simon* 3. @Hippolytus* 4. @Insanity* 5. @NuclearBurrito* 6. @orangeandblack5* 7. @Moleland* 8. @Strangle*
(* means I have gotten their stats & Sin)
# Graveyard Hippo-Shredded on Trap 3 (8 Doors) Moleland-Eaten on Trap 3 (8 Doors) Nuclear Burrito-Eaten on Trap 3 (8 Doors) ~~Simon-Left for Dead on Trap 4 (The Pit)~~ Escaped by climbing Orange-Left for Dead on Trap 4 ( The Pit) ~~Insanity Left for Dead on Trap 4 ( The Pit)~~ Escaped by climbing Insanity-Poisioned By Iced Tea on Trap 5(Tea Time!) Strangle-Poisioned By Iced Tea on Trap 5(Tea Time!)
